Section.name: About KORMCE
Section.description:
Kandula Obul Reddy Memorial College of Engineering (KORMCE) was established in 2006. Kadapa is on Renigunta and Guntakal railway line connecting major cities like Chennai, Mumbai and Hyderabad etc. Excellent bus facilities exist from Kadapa to major towns. The nearest airport is Tirupathi
